name: Dhaka Street Cricket
description: A fun, fast-paced cricket event for young talents in Dhaka. Bring your A-game and compete with the best!

name: Midnight Football Showdown
description: Join us for a thrilling 6-a-side football showdown under the lights. Winner takes home medals and cash prize.

name: Beach Volleyball Bash
description: Cox’s Bazar's biggest beach volleyball event is back! Enjoy sun, sand, and competitive games.
